explanation: The majority of the opinions about BTC are positive or bullish, with many users referencing personal success stories, institutional bullishness, and macro news as highly favorable for BTC. There is repeated mention of BTC being an early and valuable investment, breaking through important levels, and outperforming other assets. Several users advocate for holding or buying more BTC, ignoring short-term FUD. While a few users mention short-term sell or correction possibilities, these are outnumbered by strong buy and hold sentiment and stories of building wealth through BTC. Multiple comments reference technical setups, with some calling for minor corrections but overall expecting higher highs and new all-time highs. The community sentiment is overwhelmingly positive and encourages buying or holding BTC, especially on dips, suggesting high confidence in ongoing upward momentum. Leverage is discussed frequently, with many experienced traders suggesting high leverage for those with strong risk management.
